ResourceHeader.ResourceName: EISCAT CP7 Tromso VHF Radar (Raw Ne)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP7 raw electron density from the Tromso VHF Radar.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7  Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP7 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP7 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3
